title: Why am I getting 20min+ queues multiple times per day?
body: As I sit here and type this, my queue for URF is 25:09 :(

replies.body: lol restart the queue? You should be finding games within a minute.
I do, tried relogging and everything. It's significantly shorter if I play with friends.

What happens sometimes is that your client doesn't quite send the data to the server which puts you in queue, but your local timer starts anyway because of awesome programming. That's what I think is happening to you. Does this happen in any other queues you enter, or just URF? What happens if you try to go into a bot game?
